tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vaccines (
    vaccine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vaccine_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE,
    quantity INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE VaccinationRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    vaccine_id INT NOT NULL,
    vaccination_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (vaccine_id) REFERENCES VaccineInventory(id)
);

CREATE TABLE vaccine_centers (
    center_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    center_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contact_person VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE vaccines (
    vaccine_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vaccine_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    dosage_amount INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE vaccine_inventory (
    inventory_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vaccine_id INT NOT NULL,
    center_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE healthcare_workers (
    worker_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    worker_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    role VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    center_id INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE vaccine_administration (
    administration_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vaccine_id INT NOT NULL,
    recipient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    vaccination_date DATE NOT NULL,
    health_worker_id INT NOT NULL
)
